Posts.EditableText: One year three months later and I [i:1ybjf0jm]actually[/i:1ybjf0jm] show up. A testament to my lazyness, I suppose. Basically I just totally forgot about this place and all my old pals. I've escaped from the horrors of the Australian Education System to the wonderful land of TAFE, so I have quite a bit of time on my hands. I'll lurk around here from now on (If I remember) and might even make a game. I hope this place is still alive, anyway. Thana
